title: New: Arctic Monkeys – R U Mine?
body:
Despite claiming they wouldn’t be retreating back to the studio until 2013, earlier today **Arctic Monkeys** released a surprise single in the form of the grunge heavy _R U Mine?_ Accompanied by a black and white, entirely tongue in cheek video, _R U Mine?_ finds **Turner’s** vocals at their finest since 2007’s **_Favourite Worst Nightmare_**.

With their last two records proving slightly questionable in quality, it’s brilliant to hear the four piece back to their very best.

excerpt.full: Despite claiming they wouldn’t be retreating back to the studio until 2013, earlier today Arctic Monkeys released a surprise single in the form of the grunge heavy R U Mine? Accompanied by a black and white, entirely tongue in cheek video, R U Mine? finds Turner’s vocals at their finest since 2007’s Favourite Worst Nightmare. \[…\]
